name: Improvised Refinery
desc: Install an improvised refinery onto the ship. A refinery can slowly convert Ore into Supplies. The conversion process is inefficient and results in %s loss of market value. Refinery requires a lot of space and a large power source, which makes installation feasible only on Capital ships.
short: Refinery that turns Ore into Metals

name: Dedicated Repair Equipment
desc: This ship features equipment that's specifically designed for repair purposes. It can conduct ship repairs using metals directly. Increases hull and armor repair rate by %s and reduces supply usage during CR recovery by %s. Can repair one ship at a time.
